subject: World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
Soccer
Soccer
lead_paragraph: With Uruguay’s star striker Luis Suárez on the bench, Costa Rica began Group D play with a major upset, scoring three goals in the second half.
snippet: With Uruguay’s star striker Luis Suárez on the bench, Costa Rica began Group D play with a major upset, scoring three goals in the second half.
